ema palath sabhawalata himi balaya 13 wani aandukrama wya horana samaja deshapalana andaraya (1956-1957) adhirajya nambunama ahosi kere labana sathiyata wame paksha wisin samahara awasthawaladi mayi dinaya pawathwuye itha rahasigathawaya. 56 janatha jayagrahanayath samaga shri lankawe palamuwana warata mayi dinaya rajaye niwadu dinayak bawata prakashayata pathkarana ladi. 1934 patan loka kamkaru dinaya pawathwannata pelapali yannata raswim thabannata dhanapathi aan nidahase suwanda nta bara di ema wasarema marthu masa dewanida sinhala prabhun 11 denaku wisin udarata giwisuma athsan kota shri lankawe swadhinathwaya ingrisinta pawadi wasara ekasiya this dekakuth masa nawayayi dina dekakata pasu 1948 pebarawari 4 wanida apata yali nidahasa labuni.

pasugiya 11 wanada pawathi shri lanka podujana peramune samuluwen anathuruwa dayasiri jayasekara mahathawa durakathanayen amatha janadhipathiwaraya me bawa pawasa athi bawa pawase.  shri lanka podujana peramune samajikathwaya labagath es.bi disanayaka, dilan perera yana parlimenthu mantha්riwarun ha ema awasthawata sahabhagi wu palath palana mantha්riwarunge paksha samajikathwaya ahosi kirimatath, owunta erehiwa winaya piyawara ganimatath thiranaya kara thibe.

mema kshetha්ra thula me thaththwaya wardhanaya kirima sa`daha iwahal wana wadasatahan malawak diyath kala yuthuya.  pawul thula ga්ramiya samithi samagam thula pa්radeshiya saha jathika mattame aayathana thula thirana ganime ka්riyawaliyata kantha niyojithayinge sahabhagithwaya wardhanaya kirima sa`daha awashya naithikamaya katayuthu aarthika ha samajiya sahayogaya labadiya yuthuya.  manawa himikam pa්ragnyapthiya saha sido sammuthiya ka්riyawata nanwima baladharinge wagakimaki, eewa soya balime sruju wagakimen da janathawa bahara wiya yuthu natha.

“mawuwaru widesha rakiya sandaha yamen daruwantath pawul walatath athi wana prashna diha balala, swami purushaya widesha rakiyawata yama thamayi danata thiyena honda ma de hatiyata penenne,” yi niyojya samanyadhikari mangala randeniya pawasiya.
ee wagema harima aabharanaya harima aakarayata palandima oba gana obage paurushaya gana bahira lokayata kiyapanawa.
niyojya pradhana lekam (piris ha puhunu karyalaya) - sabaragamuwa palath sabhawa.

ayadumkaruge namin da ?

ohuge sithangi sathsarin ridma gatha wu klaransma gayu “sanakeliye sanda eliye dimuthu lathawayi” githaya menma “sanda thaniwela” saha “kalak awamen perum pura” (miltan mallawaaarachchi samanga anjalin da lanarol gunathilaka) - “okanda wela sitha” (anjalin) - “sonduru lowata mal wahala” (ech. aar. jothipala samanga sujatha aththanayaka) - “wasanthaye mal kakulayi” (indrani perera) wani githa da thawamath rasika aadaraya dinagena athi sumiyuru chithrapata githa we.karunarathna abesekarayan wisin rachitha “dilipa podi puthu” githaya gayamin eekala (thani) githa gayanayata ek wu klarans “malata bambaareku se” - “muwa hasarali sagare” - “hada wile oba pipuna” - “sihina lowak dutuwa mathakayi” - “ran dunuke mala” - “ran samanalayin igilenu daka mata” - “duwa ma wagedo” - “hiru pibidena wita” (maliniye) - “hindi wadan miyuru sarin” - “dineka me nadi thire” wani rasabara githawaliyak siya handin githawath kale ya.
ewita ema siyalu rogi thaththwayanma salaka bala ee ee pudgalayata aawenika wu prathikara kramaweda ha aushadha ratawanta yomu kirimen ema roga nittawatama suwa kirimata hakiyawa pawathinneya.
apata thawa ewani gandharwayan ek keneku, denneku, pas deneku daha deneku ho siya deneku wuwa wadi natha.
